data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Bidar.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bidar, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Bidar to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bidar, Karnataka, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Bidar.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Chapparband (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Bidar, Karnataka, India to the gospel today.
Lord, the believers in the county of Bidar, Karnataka, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bidar, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,703,300.

We estimate Bidar has 18,736 people who might know Jesus, 20,667 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,663,897 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Bidar, Karnataka, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
